item.title: Lisp-List
item.description:
Lisp List

  • Lisp QuickStart: The goal of this tutorial is not to teach you many of those powerful features: rather it’s to teach you just enough of Lisp that you can get up and coding quickly if you have a previous background in a procedural language such as C or Java.

  • 2009-The Scheme Programming Language 📚

Resource

Book

  • 2020-Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming 📚: Lisp code for the textbook “Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming”

Racket

  • Beautiful Racket 📚: how to make your own pro­gram­ming lan­guages with racket by matthew but­t­er­ick · ver­sion 1.0

  • PLAI 编程环境简单介绍：本文简单介绍一下译文 PLAI 中 Racket 集成开发环境界面和最基础的 racket 语法。
